summary: Ishikawa Goemon (Ichikawa Raizo), a talented young ninja, becomes ensnared in a twisted scheme to assassinate Oda Nobunaga, an evil warlord bent on ruling feudal Japan with an iron fist. ... See full summary »
cast: Raizô Ichikawa|Shiho Fujimura|Yûnosuke Itô|Katsuhiko Kobayashi|Tomisaburô Wakayama|Yôko Uraji|Reiko Fujiwara|Chitose Maki|Kyôko Kishida|Takeshi Katô|Kô Nishimura|Yutaka Nakamura|Kuniichi Takami|Toshio Chiba|Sônosuke Sawamura|Yoshi Katô|Kôichi Mizuhara|Shintarô Nanjô|Yûsaku Terashima|Shôzô Nanbu|Saburô Date|Yôichi Funaki|Seishirô Hara|Tokio Oki|Jun Fujikawa|Yukio Horikita|Tadashi Iwata|Masayoshi Kikuno|Akira Konami|Gen Kimura|Akiko Inoue
title: Shinobi no mono
